result.title: Very interesting problem with queries!
result.content:
Hello Codeforces!

I have a good problem, but I dont know the solution. Please help me!

We have array of size N consist of straight lines (y = kx + b we have k[i] and b[i]) and Q queries: l, r, x, y â€” print Yes if on range l..r exist line that point (x,y) lies on it else print No

Constraints:

all numbers are integer!!!

N, Q <= 10^5

Ki, Bi, x, y <= 10^9
